Reviews.Title: Very Good phone, great bang for your buck
Reviews.Author: Markus W Buchman
Reviews.Content: Have had the phone about a month now and very happy with it.  No Lag, I play many games on it and no issues.  When compared to some other "name brand" phones on the market off contract it is a no brainer!

Reviews.Title: Cheap but strong cellphone
Reviews.Author: Itsho
Reviews.Content: It is working very fast, very convenient, and very important - it's much cheaper than other cellphones with same-grade CPU and RAM.therefore, I gave it 5 stars :-)I like:* the look - it's round on the edges, very smooth and convenient to hold in your hand.* the speed - it just works. fast, easy, and no hassle. (even after rooting the phone)* the weight - very light (even with case I've bought)* the size - 4.5 in. is just perfect (for me) :-)* the fact that it arrived with many languages installed (incl. Hebrew)* it has 8MP cameraI dislike about this cellphone:* the fact that it doesn't have a hardware key for home button. it is nessacery when you want to see the screen during a phone-call.* the power button seems a little fragile and non-professional (unlike the whole cell-phone)I dislike about peripherals:* the fact that it's very hard to find cases to this cellphone - the variety is very small* same goes with screen protector. It's very hard to find non-reflecting (matte) one. and when i did find one, it cost more than similar-size cellphones's screen-protectors.P.S.I'm using it for about a month.

Reviews.Title: Don't want to spend Apple or Samsung prices on a smartphone? This is the one to buy !
Reviews.Author: G. Thissen
Reviews.Content: Really a great phone for it's price. Clean install of Android 4.2.Fast.One reviewer said:"Even if this phone had half it's features, I would still recommend it!"And I agree. I'm very happy with it.

Dual SIM card standby (GSM/3G-WCDMA)
2G: GSM 850/900/1800/1900MHz. 3G: WCDMA 850/2100MHz.
Capacitive multi-touch screen
Quad-band SIM1/SIM2/GSM/GPRS/EDGE (850/900/1800/1900MHz),SIM1/3G(850/2100)
